review: I purchased this to have something hard wired into our network after having signal issues due to distance from our router with the streaming stick. We love the speed and responsiveness of the user interface and voice searching is pretty reliable. After trying roku and several smart TVs I think this is the best thing out there right now by far. All the apps I've loaded so far have been great.PS. The screen saver is one of the best features! Super gorgeous ultra high def landscape pictures in slide show will show you some of the most beautiful places on earth. I confess to sitting mesmerized by it, wanting to visit all the places on the slide show.
author: Patrick Harris Schulz
